problem_text_cn: 如图,过平行四边形ABCD对角线交点O的线段EF,分别交AD,BC于点E,F,当AE=ED时,△AOE的面积为4,则四边形EFCD的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the line segment EF passing through the intersection point O of the diagonal of the parallelogram ABCD intersects AD, BC at the points E, F respectively. When AE = ED, the area of ​​△AOE is N_0, then the area of ​​the quadrilateral EFCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC,AO=CO,OB=OD∴∠DAC=∠ACB,∵∠AOE=∠COF∴△COF≌△AOE(ASA)∵S~△AOE~=4,AE=ED∴S~△COF~=S~△DOE~=S~△AOE~=4,∴S~△AOD~=8∵AO=CO∴S~△COD~=S~△AOD~=8∴S~四边形EFCD~=S~△DOE~+S~△COD~+S~△COF~=4+8+4=16；故选:C．
